price: Sε (atamfoͻ no) nyaa emu akwan bi wuraa (Madina kuro no mu) maa wͻbɛpuee (nkͻnkͻnsafoͻ no) so, εna wͻreka akyerε wͻn sε wͻnyε basabasa (anaasε wͻnko ntia Muslimifoͻ no) a, anka wͻbεyε a wͻnkyεre ho koraa.
arabic: وَلَوۡ دُخِلَتۡ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنۡ أَقۡطَارِهَا ثُمَّ سُئِلُواْ ٱلۡفِتۡنَةَ لَأٓتَوۡهَا وَمَا تَلَبَّثُواْ بِهَآ إِلَّا يَسِيرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaw dukhilat ʿalayhim min aqṭārihā thumma su-ilū al-fit'nata laātawhā wamā talabbathū bihā illā yasīran
